planck_density.result: Too high by ~50 orders of magnitude

cosmological_density.result: Too low by ~6 orders of magnitude

jeans_criterion.result: Works but requires galaxy scaling relations

conclusion.reason: ρ_crit encodes virial state of self-gravitating systems
conclusion.comparison: Analogous to MOND a₀ - empirical scale parameter

current_understanding.rho_crit: A × V^B with A≈0.25, B≈1.6 - EMPIRICAL virial scaling
